name: Tropico de Capricornio

reviews.text: Wonderful breakfast. The Swiss-French couple that runs the place gives you a wonderfull time. Do not forget asking Mr. Elios to turn on the downstairs dry sauna!!! Really good place with spectacular swimming pool with nice view to Buzios city and its bays.
reviews.title: Amazing place to stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hosts were extremely welcoming and friendly, the breakfast was wonderful with a great choice of food. The pool was very chic as was the room! It was also very clean. Would definitely return. From Ed and Marine (France).
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic place - the owners are very friendly; the place is marvellous and the view over the sea is majestic!
reviews.title: One of the best hotels I have ever been (and I have been in a few round the world!))

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: a nightmare......a 1 star hotel at best!!!!!

reviews.text: Buzios is a wonderful place with many superb places to stay ...avoid here and you will have a brilliant time.
reviews.title: Above everything else in Buzios!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location was great and the view was outstanding. The hosts were very helpful with advice on things to do in the area as well as organising airport transfers. I would definitely recommend this as a place to stay.
reviews.title: beautiful location/property with very helpful and welcoming hosts

reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights while travelling in Brazil in Jan 2010. It's a private home run by a very welcoming couple, with amazing views over the bays of Buzios. All of the rooms have private terraces and are large and very comfortable. Great breakfasts. It's secluded with a lovely pool area - a great experience.
reviews.title: Beautiful location and environment

reviews.text: The service was very efficient and of high quality. The inns were very nice and helpfull.
reviews.title: Perfect for great relaxation and fun

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are beautifull and I enjoyed the large space in the room, the beautiful view and all the beautiful upgrades like granits on floor and walls in bathrooms and nice wooden floor and decorated doors etc..
reviews.title: Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is great and the amenities above standards!
reviews.title: An amazing experience with excellent views and location for local beaches & shops.

reviews.text: Tropico di Capricornio can be highly recommended to people who appreciate a very caring, attentive personal service (they actually try to read your wish before you mention it) in an artistic, high standard surrounding.
reviews.title: EXTREMELY PERSONAL AND WARM ATTENTION

reviews.text: There, you are really efficiently attended from A to Z and the breakfast table is set - besides marvellous food - with finest French porcelaine and napkins.
reviews.title: Incredibly gorgeous Villa with the most phenomenal views of the bay of Buzios

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a real PLEASURE to let yourself spoil there!
reviews.title: I love the hotel and the hostess, it is perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are no words to describe how beautiful this pousada is. I think the owner told us it was ranked one of the 20 most beautiful villas in Brazil. That does not surprise me. A truly hidden gem!
reviews.title: Pousada with great pool and view

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think calling the Tropico de Capricornio a boutique hotel is slightly misleading. My understanding of boutique hotels is that they are usually high end, luxurious and “designer chic” Make no mistake, this is more akin to a guest house than a boutique hotel. The Tropico villa did not offer the style or service that one expects when booking into a boutique hotel.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the plus side, there are beautiful, expansive views of Buzios from the villa and, the owners (French-Swiss) freshly baked croissants each morning were very nice. The gardens and pool area are very well maintained and in general, it is a really pretty setting in what appears to be the exclusive and upmarket end of Buzios.
reviews.title: Fantastic pousada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Now for the negatives! The Tropico is approximately a 20 minute walk from the town up a steep hill, which in the searing heat, is not an entirely pleasant walk.
reviews.title: Fantastic views, beautiful pousada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our arrival, we were not offered any refreshment which was disappointing as this gesture appeared to be offered as standard in all the hotels and guest houses we stayed in on our trip. These are the little touches I would expect to receive at a boutique hotel. The owner did show us around the villa to the more expensive rooms in order to catch our interest in upgrading at the increased rate!
reviews.title: Lovely escape

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was ok décor wise. It had a fridge which contained soft drinks which were free of charge and a rather sizeable bathroom which was more modern than the room it was adjoined to. It also had a balcony which overlooked the bay area of the town.
reviews.title: The perfect escape from the big city

description: Tropico de Capricornio is a lovely boutique hotel situated on the heights of Alto de Búzios, a privileged and protected quarter in the heart of an 8,000 m² tropical park, totally closed off and secure. Eight very comfortable suites offer an unequaled panoramic view over Ferradura beach and Búzios.
